org.gradoop.flink.model.impl

Class EPGMDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.EPGMDatabase
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class EPGMDatabase
extends Object
    Represents an EPGM database. Enables access to the database graph and to all logical graphs contained in the database. The database also handles in- and output from external sources / graphs.

      • getDatabaseGraph

        @Deprecated
public LogicalGraph getDatabaseGraph(boolean withGraphContainment)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a logical graph containing the complete vertex and edge space of that EPGM database.
        Parameters:
        withGraphContainment - true, if vertices and edges shall be updated to be contained in the logical graph representing the database
        Returns:
        logical graph of vertex and edge space

      • getGraph

        @Deprecated
public LogicalGraph getGraph(GradoopId graphID)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a logical graph by its identifier. If the logical graph does not exist, an empty logical graph is returned.
        Parameters:
        graphID - graph identifier
        Returns:
        logical graph (possibly empty)
